F.03 Battery.text:
WHAT: A cutting-edge suite of technologies powering the next-generation humanoid robot platform 
CATEGORY: Battery 
FEATURES: Custom battery packs, high energy density, fast charge, battery management system, safety features 
CAPABILITIES: Powers the humanoid robot platform 
SPECS: 2.3 kWh, 5 hours of run time at peak performance, 2 kW fast charge 
COMPLIANCE: Certified to UN38.3 and UL2271 battery safety standards 
STAGE: In manufacturing ramp stage 
LIMITATIONS: None mentioned 
NOTE: First humanoid robot battery certified to a UL safety standard

company.text:
NAME: Figure 
POSITIONING: Leader in robot safety 
INDUSTRIES: Robotics 
LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/f-03-battery-development
